humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the largest tumor, which is 2.2 cm. According to the rules provided, T1 tumors are 2 cm or less in size, and T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the tumor in this report is classified as T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for breast cancer is based on the greatest dimension of the tumor. In this report, it is stated that the size of the tumor is approximately 2.2 cm. According to the TNM staging system, a T2 designation is given to tumors that measure between 2.0 cm and 5.0 cm in size. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.
